Unauthorized process accessing web brows.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for read access attempts on known web browser credential files (e.g., "*\\AppData\\Local\\Google\\Chrome\\User Data\\*\\Login Data", "*\\AppData\\Roaming\\Mozilla\\Firefox\\Profiles\\*\\logins.json"). Identify and investigate processes performing these reads that are not the legitimate web browser process.

Suspicious process command lines or memo.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation events. Filter and analyze command lines for suspicious keywords related to credential dumping or memory access utilities. Use correlation analysis to identify process creation followed by attempts to access web browser process memory (requires additional logs like Sysmon Event ID 10 for memory access).
